body_html:
@cpuhrsch
Here is the result of my test script over the PR. In term of each record, the script generates 1000 tensors with a specific probability. p_error_row averages the error of one tensor. And p_error_col averages the error of each position of all tensors.
Platform:

CPU Model Sockets Cores/Socket Frequency
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-5960X CPU 1 8 3.00GHz

Contiguity of the tensor:
contiguous
